entry.title: Organic Biodegradable Charcoal Konjac Sponge
entry.summary:
Vendor: Love Attack
Type: Konjac Sponge
Price: 10.00

Introducing the perfect beauty and skincare tool for all skin types but particularly for oily or acne prone skin. This amazing organic and biodegradable konjac sponge is infused with activated charcoal which acts like a magnet to dirt, oil and impurities in your skin.

This sponge can be used on its own or paired with your favourite cleanser for a deep clean.

This sponge comes packaged in a cute 100% recyclable paper box making the entire product 100% waste free!

Each sponge lastsÂ approx. 100 uses and can be placed in your home compost bin once finished with.

These sponges are all natural, cruelty free, vegan, biodegradable and compostable!

What is Konjac?

Konjac is a 100% natural and soluble vegetable fibre which is 100% biodegradable

How to use

For first use, simply run sponge under running water for 2-3 minutes and watch as the sponge expands and becomes soft.

Squeeze out excess water and add your favourite cleanser or used on its own in light circular motions. Not only will this sponge absorb impurities and excess oil from the skin but it will also provide a gentle exfoliation. Once done, simply rinse and hang by its string to dry.Â 

Whenever you wish to use sponge, simply reactivate it under warm water.Â 

Sponge can be hung to dry using attached string on bathroom sink or in the shower.

Made fromÂ 

100% organic biodegradable konjac sponge and infused with activated charcoal powder

Â

entry.title: Anti-Aging Rosehip Seed Oil for All Skin Types
entry.summary:
Vendor: Skin Essence Organics
Type: Facial Moisturizers & Serums
Price: 22.00

Rosehip seed oil is 100% pure, cold pressed and certified organic and naturally brightens the skin and offers luxurious hydration. It is a phenomenal option for toning the skin, reducing the appearance of sun damage and fine lines, preventing scarring, and rejuvenating skin cells.

Features + Benefits

  • Nourishes & hydrates all skin types
  • Helps reduce the appearance of fine lines & wrinkles and improves the overall complexion of the skin
  • Rich in vitamins & antioxidants for a youthful, healthy glow
  • Natural toning & brightening properties
  • Eco Cert Organic Cosmetic, USDA Organic, Leaping Bunny Certified, Non GMO, Vegan, Gluten Free and Fair Trade
  • 100% of the total ingredients are from organic farming as calculated by the Eco-Cert Cosmetic Standard

How to use

To ensure deep absorption, massage into the skin thoroughly.

*Tip- After cleansing your skin and before applying the serum, splash your face with cool water. This will help to close your skinâ€™s pores and the water on the face will also allow the serum to spread easily and evenly. Water also has a natural capillary action, which will help to pull the vitamins and minerals into your skin, leaving a healthy glow! (Each serum takes about 5 minutes to fully absorb)

Prefer a lighter hydration?Â Simply add a couple of drops of water to 1-2 pumps of this moisturizing serum on the palm of your hand, before applying to your face. The more water you add, the lighter the hydration will be.
Our oil-based moisturizers are fully customizable to help you get the right hydration for your skin and the weather changes.

For optimum freshness, use within 3 months of opening.

Composition

One of natureâ€™s richest sources of Omega 3, vitamins and antioxidants, Rosehip Seed Oil delays the effects of aging, assists with skin cell regeneration, and stimulates collagen production in the skin. This results in a firmer, smoother, and more youthful complexion with improved elasticity.Â (Non-comedogenic)

Ingredients

100% Pure Rosehip Seed Oil*Â *Ingredient from organic farming

entry.title: Eye Makeup Remover + Cleansing Oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: Love Attack
Type: Cleanser
Price: 15.00

HandcraftedÂ from 100% organic, cold-pressedÂ botanical oils, thisÂ unscentedÂ eye make up remover is designed to gently loosen andÂ strip away eye and brow make up without causing any damage or discomfort to your delicate eye area.

ThisÂ cleansing oil is designed to remove dirt, oil and impurities from your skin. These oils have been specifically curated to leave skin feeling soothed, nourished and hydrated and most importantly...clean!

Key IngredientsÂ + Benefits

  • Organic Sunflower OilÂ | Sunflower Oil has high amounts of Vitamins A,B,D and E as well as minerals,Â lecithin and unsaturated fatty acids which are all great for your skin.

  • Organic Sweet Almond OilÂ | Sweet Almond Oil is an excellent emollient and is known to soften and recondition the skin. High in Vitamin D and proteins as well as Linoleic acid, which all help skin retain moisture as well asÂ treating dry, irritated skin.

  • Organic Golden Jojoba OilÂ | Jojoba Oil is rich in Vitamin E and leaves skin healthy and glowing. It is also anti-inflammatory and can be used to treat dryness in the skin as well as help repair damaged skin.

How to use

Pump 1-3 drops of oil on fingertips. Massaging onto eye area to gently remove eye and brow make up. Add water to emulsify the product. Pay special attention to eye lashes and eye brows.Â Wipe away residue withÂ our reusable black cotton facial rounds and continue onÂ toÂ your regular cleanser.Â 

Do not get directly in eyes.Â 

Bottles left in direct sunlight may lighten in colour over time due to theÂ natural botanicalÂ oils used. To maintain beautiful golden colour, please store in a cool dark place out of direct light.

Ingredients

Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Oil* , Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond)Â Oil* ,Â  Simmondsia Chinensis (Golden Jojoba) Oil*Â 

*100% Organic Ingredient

Product Information

  • 50ml recyclable glass bottle and pump dispenser

  • NotÂ recommended for those with a tree nut allergy

entry.title: FACE IT Pink Reusable Cleansing Cloth
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cloth in a Box
Type: Facecloth
Price: 18.00

A cleansing, cleaning and exfoliating make-up remover for the face and neck.

Circular hand movements and microfibre fabric completely remove make-up, cleanse thoroughly, massage gently and exfoliate the face gently.

Benefits

  • Works by just adding water
  • Ultra-soft microfiber fabric gently exfoliates and deep cleans
  • Removes make-up, oils and dirt to leave skin fresh, clean and smooth
  • Provides instant radiance and promotes cellular renewal
  • For all skin types
  • Economical and reusable
  • Environmentally friendly
  • Easy to use and maintain

How to use

The heart shape perfectly matches your face. Simply insert your hands into the pockets to exert the desired pressure and cleanse your face with a simple circular upward motion. Use FACE IT with water or a few drops of your cleansing lotion. Used daily morning and evening, the towel can help prevent premature signs of aging and promote skin cell renewal.

Caring for your FACE ITÂ 

Before first use, wash in warm water with a mild detergent. After each use, clean by hand with one of our Marseille soaps and warm water. Squeeze well, then hang to dry. After a few uses,Â machineÂ washÂ and tumble dry at low temperature. The pockets must be facing outwards. Do not use chlorine, bleach or fabric softener.

For best results, replace after 100 washes.

100% polyester. Designed in Quebec.

entry.title: Adult Bamboo Nylon Toothbrush 4-Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Brush Naked Bamboo Toothbrush Co
Type: Toothbrush
Price: 23.00

Brush Naked Bamboo Toothbrushes 4-pack contains 4 adult size toothbrushes in green, naked, pink and white. This multi-pack of 4 toothbrushes comes in 1 box to reduce packaging and reduce the environmental footprint.

Features + Benefits

  • 100% biodegradable bamboo handle
  • BPA-free DuPont nylon bristlesÂ containingÂ 65% Castor Bean Oil for less carbon used in production
  • Each brush is wrapped in 100% biodegradable/compostable cello which is made from wood and cotton pulp
  • Paper box packaging is compostable and biodegradable
  • Each bamboo toothbrush is naturally anti-bacterial and anti-microbial

entry.title: Body Dry Brush - Normal Skin
entry.summary:
Vendor: Merben International Inc.
Type: Body Dry Brush
Price: 18.00

Body Dry BrushÂ gentlyÂ removes dead skin, exfoliates, stimulates circulation, eliminates body toxins and reduces the appearance of cellulite and is suitable for all skin types.Â 

We recommend dry brushing for a few minutes before a morning shower. Brush in circular motions; start at your feet and move over the entire body. Always brush toward your heart with light pressure. Gradually increase pressure as you build your daily routine.

Benefits

Skin is our largest organ. When healthy, itâ€™s the vehicle through which environmental pollutants and toxins are eliminated from the body. When not, pores become clogged and the â€œyucky stuffâ€ stays inside us, where it can build up and wreak havoc.

Regularly dry brushing is so beneficial because it improves the bodyâ€™s ability to detoxify by clearing away dead skin cells. It also increases blood flow and circulation (the bristles from the brush stimulate your lymphatic system, consequently speeding up the process of waste elimination). And as if that werenâ€™t enough, dry brushing also easily and painlessly reduces the appearance of cellulite and leaves skin looking and feeling younger

    How to use

    • Brush before bath or shower by brushing in circular motions, starting at your feet and moving upwards, towards the heart with light pressure
    • Gradually increase the pressure of the dry brushing over time
    • Brush can be used both wet or dryÂ 
    • After use, rinse dry brush clean, shake of excess water and hang to dry outside of your shower
    • After use, rinse dry brush clean, shake of excess water and hang to dry outside of your shower.
    • Gradually increase the pressure of the dry brushing over time

entry.title: Bikini Dry Brush - Normal Skin
entry.summary:
Vendor: Merben International Inc.
Type: Bikini Dry Brush
Price: 18.00

By gently brushing the bikini area on a daily basis with our soft handmade natural jute brush, the dry layers of skin are removed, allowing the hair to grow in properly.

So go ahead, wear the tiniest of tiny bikinis and be confident that you look great - all over!

And as if that werenâ€™t enough, dry brushing also easily and painlessly reduces the appearance of cellulite and leaves skin looking and feeling younger.

How to use

  • Use wet or dry in between waxing to avoid ingrown hairs
  • Gently brushÂ in a circular motion daily or every other day around the bikini areaÂ
